slots.description: Primary offensive equipment - swords, guns, keys, umbrellas, and other items used for attack.
Secondary equipment slot for shields, orbs, secondary weapons, or utility items.
Headgear for awareness and protection - hats, helmets, and other head-worn items.
Body protection covering the chest and torso area.
Footwear for mobility and protection - boots, shoes, and other foot equipment.
First accessory slot for utility items like rings, amulets, and special tools.
Second accessory slot for additional utility items and magical accessories.
Companion creature with personality that provides assistance and companionship.
